item.title: Version 1.1.9
item.description:
Protip: Turn off Asynchronous Reprojection in Lone Echo and Echo Arena to get rid of jitter/judder issues.

Changes

  • Preliminary support for Oculus Runtime 1.16, doesn't include Vulkan support yet
  • Updated to OpenVR 1.0.8

Bug fixes

  • Fixed Lone Echo not launching from the dashboard (Restart SteamVR after updating) (#689)
